notes.text: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
Tree tables and analytical tables are now correctly loaded in the flexible programming model explorer
We now consider all navigation paths including the parent level navigation while creating a binding path
We've implemented the DataFieldForActionGroup annotation, which allows the grouping of actions and their rendering within menu buttons
We've resolved an issue with the email validation string that caused the application to become unresponsive
We now support using an absolute path as the target entity for side effects events in a list report
We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
We now properly manage focus on the table when grouping data
We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
We now update the BreadCrumbs link after data changes
You can now specify a title for the action confirmation dialog
We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
We now ensure that the messages from the back end containing braces are properly displayed on the UI
We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
We now ensure that the contextPath property is consistently bound to the meta model, allowing the correct context path to be generated regardless of any entity name conflicts
We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
We've resolved a performance issue that occurred while creating an object in collaborative draft mode
We now ensure side effects are executed before saving a document on the object page
We now request validation and message side effects in the same batch to improve performance
We now ensure that the application state is not preserved when entering and exiting the key user adaptation mode
We've resolved an issue with calling the InvokeAction extension of the EditFlow controller when the context parameter is an array of contexts
We now ensure that back navigation works correctly when an SAP Fiori elements-based application is embedded in another application
We've resolved an issue with handling the startup parameters for applications using the sap-keep-alive mode
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
We now ensure that changes made in the manifest.json file when using feature toggles are not lost after navigating back and forth between apps
